name: The Trash Collector
description:
"Collecting everyone's trash is exhausting... Isn't it?"

This is my submission for the Bitsy Trash Jam! I tried to explore a little the concept of "having to bear with someone else's problem" and I hope you like it!

-Music Credits:

♫ Track: Satie - Gymnopédie No. 1
